scripts.seed:all: npm run seed:facilities && npm run seed:events && npm run seed:sns
scripts.wipe: node -e "import('dotenv/config');import('mongodb').then(async m=>{const c=new m.MongoClient(process.env.MONGODB_URI);await c.connect();const d=c.db(process.env.DB_NAME||'tokyo_hackathon_dev');await Promise.all(['users','events','facilities','sns'].map(n=>d.collection(n).deleteMany({})));console.log('ðŸ§¹ wiped');await c.close();})"
